answers.answer: Hi,The common causes of erectile dysfunction are diabetes mellitus & hypertension which are also the risk factors for the heart attack and thus patients who have got erectile dysfunction are evaluated for the presence of a heart disease by doing tests like a stress ECG or echocardiography. Atherosclerosis (deposition of fat within the blood vessels) is responsible for both the heart attack and erectile dysfunction in these patients. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care.

question: My husband was diagnosed years ago with Pehronie's disease. He can function as long as he has a dose of Viagra. He recently discovered an article which states that recent studies show that men with ED have a higher risk of having a heart attack.  Has anyone heard of this?
title: ED and heart attack risk
